channel.title: Comments on: 10 Questions (with apologies to James Lipton & Bernard Pivot!)

item.title: By: Sean Mcclelland

item.description: Yeah, I think the Bieber haircut might look good on you!
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I think the Bieber haircut might look good on you!

item.title: By: Jim Munson

item.description: Thanks, Anneliese - you just gave me a great laugh for a Friday afternoon!
item.content:encoded: Thanks, Anneliese – you just gave me a great laugh for a Friday afternoon!

item.description: I had no idea that Lawrence, Kansas was the center of the Google Maps universe!
item.content:encoded: I had no idea that Lawrence, Kansas was the center of the Google Maps universe!

item.title: By: Gail Persily
